channel.title: Vagrant on My New Hugo Site

item.title: packer
item.description: Join us as we discuss Packer with Mitchell Hashimoto Watch Now Panel Chef News Outline Picks Download Audio Video Panel Mitchell Hashimoto github, twitter Brandon Burton github, twitter Bryan Berry github, twitter, irc: bryanwb, blog: devopsanywhere John Vincent, aka Lusis twitter, github Mike Fiedler github, twitter, blog Nathen Harvey github, twitter, irc: nathenharvey, blog Chef News Infrastructure upgrades with Chef - A blog post from Etsy on how they roll-out minor changes to their infrastructure using knife-spork and knife-flip.
